title: Small pops more vulnerable to unpredictable events

content.question: Small populations of animals, such as those typically found on islands, are prone to extinction because

choices.label: they contain a high degree of genetic variability
they tend to have more predators
they are more vulnerable to unpredictable events

content.answer: they are more vulnerable to unpredictable events

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain environmental concepts and processes.
